original_text: The name of the man was Elimelech and the name of his wife Naomi, and the names of his two sons were Mahlon and Chilion. They were Ephrathites from Bethlehem in Judah. They went into the country of Moab and remained there.
korean_text: 그 사람의 이름은 엘리멜렉이요 그의 아내의 이름은 나오미요 그의 두 아들의 이름은 말론과 기룐이니 유다 베들레헴 에브랏 사람들이더라 그들이 모압 지방에 들어가서 거기 살더니

sentences.original_text: The name of the man was Elimelech
and the name of his wife Naomi
and the names of his two sons were Mahlon and Chilion
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 두 아들의 이름은 말론과 기룐이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were Ephrathites from Bethlehem in Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 유다 베들레헴 출신의 에브랏 사람이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They went into the country of Moab
